titleStmt.title: The King of Spains cabinet council divulged; or, A discovery of the prevarications of the Spaniards with all the princes and states of Europe, for obtaining the universal monarchy.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.H. for J.S. and are to be sold by Simon Miller, at the Star in St Pauls Church-yard.,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "8ber [i.e. October] 1st"; the 8 in the imprint date has been crossed out and replaced with a "7".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Star in St Pauls Church-yard.
